alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:22AM MST until January 18 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT MST TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to Midnight MST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
